content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the power Congress is exercising and explain why the framers of the Constitution gave Congress this power. Explain how Congress could respond to the recommendations in the Select Committee’s final report. Describe the constitutional principle that supports Nixon’s refusal to provide information to Congress. Explain how Federalist 70 supports Nixon’s actions.
